definitions.definition: A small pincerlike instrument , usually made of metal , used for handling or picking up small objects (such as postage stamps ), plucking out ( plucking ) hairs, pulling out slivers, etc.

main_definition: A small pincerlike instrument , usually made of metal , used for handling or picking up small objects (such as postage stamps ), plucking out ( plucking ) hairs, pulling out slivers, etc.
